name: Time Collapse - Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2
description:
Time Collapse

Time Collapse is a 2D platformer where you can rewind or advance the time in the world while moving freely. Use this to your advantage, so that you can escape the collapsing dungeon. Watch out, you might end up rewinding the development of the game.

Better played with controller and a screen 16:9 resolution. 

This is our entry to the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

Made in Unity by using and abusing Timeline.

3D models are form the Polygon Dungeon pack bought from the AssetStore.

Main character is a recurring character in our games.

Music is original composed by Daniel Paez.

The Moon Tales team is composed by Brandon Pedraza (level designer and artist) and Daniel Paez (programmer and musician).
